feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.27.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Search tests for user relationship columns. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13728
  • Fix for component tree tooltips by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13763
  • Added support for single user column type in automation block by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13736
  • Grid UX improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13757
  • Fix @budibase/types typescript types by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13767
  • Changing REST content response processing by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13764
  • change "Links" to "Relationships" in table data source selection by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13770
  • Update package.json to publish CouchDB with 3.3.3 tag by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13771
  • Fix icon select popover and make somewhat presentable by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13761
  • Add icons to grid buttons and simplify button column by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13769

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.27.3...2.27.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.27.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Abstract lerna usage on pipelines and dockerfiles by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13784
  • Allow configuring base image for the single image Docker build. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13788
  • Allow production SQS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13793
  • Audit log SQS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13735
  • Fix for knex build issue by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13803
  • Readonly settings columns in views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13778
  • Prevent write readonly view column by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13780
  • Correct SQS URL for single image builds. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13811
  • If a user starts the onboarding process, make sure they can still accept an invite by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13794
  • Fix for template apps (old rows/views) in SQS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13795
  • Grid improvements and fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13800
  • Update view column UI by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13810
  • Drawer eval improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13807
  • Grid conflict improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13808
  • Allow field labels to wrap by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13809

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.27.4...2.27.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.27.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add tests for creating apps from templates. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13814
  • Bump mysql2 from 3.9.7 to 3.9.8 in /packages/server by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13825
  • Update account-portal submodule by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13821
  • Allow a user invite to be revoked by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13805
  • Fix mariadb healthcheck. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13832
  • Fixing some REST file download issues by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13835

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.27.5...2.27.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Migrate forced releases from QA arc runners to hosted by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13843
  • Update CouchDB chart from 4.3.0 to 4.5.3. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13845
  • NGINX headers for security audit by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13842
  • Add PR size and team labeler by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13849
  • Updating pro back to correct reference (latest) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13851
  • Feature: Helm Chart support extra env vars using K8s Secrets reference by @refucktor in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13847
  • [Feat] Readonly columns by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13824
  • Quick fix for roles binding in JS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13857
  • Enhancement: add ability to set custom auto-dismissal duration for notifications by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13829

New Contributors

  • @refucktor made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13847

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.27.6...2.28.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prepare Helm chart for SQS. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13860
  • Add readonly columns to plans by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13859

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.0...2.28.1
